snippet: Mike Martin has taken Florida State’s baseball team to the N.C.A.A. tournament in 33 seasons, winning the third-most games of any Division I coach, but he has never won a championship.
abstract: Profile of Florida State baseball coach Mike Martin, who has taken the team to the College World Series 14 times but has never won a championship; Martin has been a part of Florida State baseball for 40 years, also having spent time as a player and an assistant.
lead_paragraph: Mike Martin has taken Florida State’s baseball team to the N.C.A.A. tournament in 33 seasons, winning the third-most games of any Division I coach, but he has never won a championship.

headline.seo: Florida State Coach Martin Has Same Goal, if Not Same Perspective
headline.main: Coach Keeps Focus on Winning, Without Losing Sight of Everything Else
headline.print_headline: Coach Keeps Focus on Winning, Without Losing Sight of Everything Else
